name: ixpssixp
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wss(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wss(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))

comment: Subclass theorem for infinite Cartesian product. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
